original_text: Saul died because he turned away from the Lord. He did not obey the Lord's commands. He even tried to get advice from the spirits of dead people.
korean_text: 사울이 죽은 것은 여호와께 범죄하였기 때문이라 그가 여호와의 말씀을 지키지 아니하고 또 신접한 자에게 가르치기를 청하고

sentences.original_text: because he turned away from the Lord
He did not obey the Lord's commands
He even tried to get advice
from the spirits of dead people
